title: Potential Interpublic Group (IPG) Trade Targets 5.85% Return
content:
The patented options-trade picking algorithms used by MarketIntelligenceCenter.com found a trading opportunity with Interpublic Group of Companies Inc. (http://www.marketintelligencecenter.com/symbol/IPG"IPG) that should provide a 5.85% return in just 205 days. Sell one Apr. '16 call at the $19.00 level for each 100 shares of Interpublic Group for a net debit per share of $17.95. That net debit also serves as the break-even point for this trade, giving it 8.88% downside protection. For a riskier play with a higher potential rate of return, consider buying the Jan. '17 call at the $15.00 at about $5.25 instead of taking a long position in the stock. This lowers your net debit to $3.50, but the stock has to close above $18.50 at expiration to keep this trade from losing money. Standard & PooraEUR(TM)s gives the stock a $23.00 12-month target price and a 3 STARS (out of 5) hold ranking. Technical indicators for the stock are bearish and support has been about $19.45 with resistance around the $20.03 level.
